name: Inventive AI
long_description:
At Inventive, our mission is to build intelligence that helps B2B sales teams win deals. 

Our AI platform assists sales teams in responding to and winning RFPs and sales questionnaires. With our tailored AI system & agents, the sales team can understand and extract essential sections from RFP documents, obtain AI-generated responses to RFP questions, and receive intelligent suggestions from meeting compliance requirements to outshining competitors. 

By leveraging Inventive, sales teams can improve their efficiency by 70+%, and craft high-quality proposals that significantly enhance their chances of securing successful deals.

Built by a customer-obsessed team comprising an ex-exec from a Fortune 500 company and engineers from Google & and Stanford. Backed by top Silicon Valley investors including YCombinator.
one_liner: GenAI-First RFP & Sales Questionnaire Response Platform
